ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1.75 liter) bottle 190 proof grain alcohol (such as EverclearÂ®)
20 lemons, zested, or more to taste

cookingTips: Zest lemons carefully to avoid bitter white pith
Allow infusion to steep for at least 2 weeks for best flavor
Strain through coffee filters multiple times for clarity
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the infusion process and proper storage techniques for homemade limoncello.
